{{cpp/title|remove_reference}}
{{cpp/meta/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|type_traits}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
struct remove_reference;
}}
{{dcl end}}
If the type {{tt|T}} is a reference type, provides the member typedef {{tt|type}} which is the type referred to by {{tt|T}}. Otherwise {{tt|type}} is {{tt|T}}.

{{cpp/types/nospec}}

===Member types===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc hitem|Name|Definition}}
{{dsc|{{tt|type}}|the type referred by {{tt|T}} or {{tt|T}} if it is not a reference}}
{{dsc end}}

===Helper types===
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++14|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
using remove_reference_t = typename remove_reference&lt;T&gt;::type;
}}
{{dcl end}}

===Possible implementation===
{{eq fun
|1=
template&lt;class T&gt; struct remove_reference { typedef T type; };
template&lt;class T&gt; struct remove_reference&lt;T&amp;&gt; { typedef T type; };
template&lt;class T&gt; struct remove_reference&lt;T&amp;&amp;&gt; { typedef T type; };
}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "std::remove_reference&lt;int&gt;::type is int? "
              &lt;&lt; std::is_same&lt;int, std::remove_reference&lt;int&gt;::type&gt;::value &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "std::remove_reference&lt;int&amp;&gt;::type is int? "
              &lt;&lt; std::is_same&lt;int, std::remove_reference&lt;int&amp;&gt;::type&gt;::value &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "std::remove_reference&lt;int&amp;&amp;&gt;::type is int? "
              &lt;&lt; std::is_same&lt;int, std::remove_reference&lt;int&amp;&amp;&gt;::type&gt;::value &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "std::remove_reference&lt;const int&amp;&gt;::type is const int? "
              &lt;&lt; std::is_same&lt;const int,
                              std::remove_reference&lt;const int&amp;&gt;::type&gt;::value &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
std::remove_reference&lt;int&gt;::type is int? true
std::remove_reference&lt;int&amp;&gt;::type is int? true
std::remove_reference&lt;int&amp;&amp;&gt;::type is int? true
std::remove_reference&lt;const int&amp;&gt;::type is const int? true
}}
